title: Hour 3 - Reggie Miller (04-27-20)
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Reggie Miller (04-27-20)
description:
Reggie Miller and Dan discuss Michael Jordan and Isiah Thomas from last nights episodes of the last dance. Reggie talks about the culture back when the Detroit Pistons had to defeat Michael Jordan and the Chicago Bulls.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
